name: Nude Byte
description:
WARNING:
The game has online features that rely on GameJolt's server, which they will soon remove.
The game will become an offline game in future updates.

A high-speed action game inspired by the Splatoon series.


Features:

  • Four shooters to control, each with a unique ability
  • Fan-made cards to collect and use as weapons and upgrades
  • A crowd of enemies to fight
  • Special enemies to spice up the battle
  • 5 maps to play (Based on Splatoon 2's Salmon Run maps)
  • Glitch City, a place to chill and shop
  • Customizable characters
  • Optional NSFW features for Patreon supporters
  • Butts and tits to look at

The game is more than halfway done in its development.

More features will be added as the development progress.

If you find any bugs, feel free to share them in the comments section!

Information:

https://www.patreon.com/posts/47906500 (public post)
